00060 /***************************************************************************/
00077 void RTCC_ChannelInit( int ch, RTCC_CCChConf_TypeDef const *confPtr )
00078 {
00079   EFM_ASSERT( RTCC_CH_VALID( ch ) );
00080   EFM_ASSERT( (uint32_t)confPtr->compMask
00081               < ( _RTCC_CC_CTRL_COMPMASK_MASK >> _RTCC_CC_CTRL_COMPMASK_SHIFT )
00082               + 1 );
00083 
00085   RTCC->CC[ch].CTRL = ( (uint32_t)confPtr->chMode << _RTCC_CC_CTRL_MODE_SHIFT )
00086                       | ( (uint32_t)confPtr->compMatchOutAction << _RTCC_CC_CTRL_CMOA_SHIFT )
00087                       | ( (uint32_t)confPtr->prsSel << _RTCC_CC_CTRL_PRSSEL_SHIFT )
00088                       | ( (uint32_t)confPtr->inputEdgeSel << _RTCC_CC_CTRL_ICEDGE_SHIFT )
00089                       | ( (uint32_t)confPtr->compBase << _RTCC_CC_CTRL_COMPBASE_SHIFT )
00090                       | ( (uint32_t)confPtr->compMask << _RTCC_CC_CTRL_COMPMASK_SHIFT )
00091                       | ( (uint32_t)confPtr->dayCompMode << _RTCC_CC_CTRL_DAYCC_SHIFT );
00092 }

00094 /***************************************************************************/
00101 void RTCC_Enable( bool enable )
00102 {
00103   /* Bitbanding the enable bit in the CTRL register (atomic). */
00104   BUS_RegBitWrite((&RTCC->CTRL), _RTCC_CTRL_ENABLE_SHIFT, enable);
00105 }
00106 
00107 /***************************************************************************/
00119 void RTCC_Init( const RTCC_Init_TypeDef *init )
00120 {
00121   RTCC->CTRL = ( (uint32_t)init->enable << _RTCC_CTRL_ENABLE_SHIFT )
00122                | ( (uint32_t)init->debugRun << _RTCC_CTRL_DEBUGRUN_SHIFT )
00123                | ( (uint32_t)init->precntWrapOnCCV0 << _RTCC_CTRL_PRECCV0TOP_SHIFT )
00124                | ( (uint32_t)init->cntWrapOnCCV1 << _RTCC_CTRL_CCV1TOP_SHIFT )
00125                | ( (uint32_t)init->presc << _RTCC_CTRL_CNTPRESC_SHIFT )
00126                | ( (uint32_t)init->prescMode << _RTCC_CTRL_CNTTICK_SHIFT )
00127 #if defined(_RTCC_CTRL_BUMODETSEN_MASK)
00128                | ( (uint32_t)init->enaBackupModeSet << _RTCC_CTRL_BUMODETSEN_SHIFT )
00129 #endif
00130                | ( (uint32_t)init->enaOSCFailDetect << _RTCC_CTRL_OSCFDETEN_SHIFT )
00131                | ( (uint32_t)init->cntMode << _RTCC_CTRL_CNTMODE_SHIFT )
00132                | ( (uint32_t)init->disLeapYearCorr << _RTCC_CTRL_LYEARCORRDIS_SHIFT );
00133 }
00134 
00135 /***************************************************************************/
00139 void RTCC_Reset( void )
00140 {
00141   int i;
00142 
00143   /* Restore all RTCC registers to their default values. */
00144   RTCC_Unlock();
00145   RTCC->CTRL    = _RTCC_CTRL_RESETVALUE;
00146   RTCC->PRECNT  = _RTCC_PRECNT_RESETVALUE;
00147   RTCC->CNT     = _RTCC_CNT_RESETVALUE;
00148   RTCC->TIME    = _RTCC_TIME_RESETVALUE;
00149   RTCC->DATE    = _RTCC_DATE_RESETVALUE;
00150   RTCC->IEN     = _RTCC_IEN_RESETVALUE;
00151   RTCC->IFC     = _RTCC_IFC_MASK;
00152   RTCC_StatusClear();
00153   RTCC->EM4WUEN = _RTCC_EM4WUEN_RESETVALUE;
00154 
00155   for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00156   {
00157     RTCC->CC[i].CTRL = _RTCC_CC_CTRL_RESETVALUE;
00158     RTCC->CC[i].CCV  = _RTCC_CC_CCV_RESETVALUE;
00159     RTCC->CC[i].TIME = _RTCC_CC_TIME_RESETVALUE;
00160     RTCC->CC[i].DATE = _RTCC_CC_DATE_RESETVALUE;
00161   }
00162 }
00163 
00164 /***************************************************************************/
00168 void RTCC_StatusClear( void )
00169 {
00170   while ( RTCC->SYNCBUSY & RTCC_SYNCBUSY_CMD )
00171   {
00172     // Wait for syncronization.
00173   }
00174   RTCC->CMD = RTCC_CMD_CLRSTATUS;
00175 }
